Why Dance is Important

There are may different styles of dance all across the world. These dances bring people together and tell stories without verbally speaking. Dance has historically brought people together all across the globe. This website will be covering three styles of dance that are popular in western culture: ballet, tap, and jazz. These styles of dance are popular all around the world, but are most notable to western culture. Ballet is the most common, as it is a classic form of dance traced back to countries like France, Russia, and Italy. Jazz and tap are based off of the teachings of ballet, but are much looser in stance and ability.

Kaci Balfany 2018
